content.webTitle: Donald McRae speaks to cricketer Shane Bond

fields.headline: 'Once you're told you're not playing you mentally move on'
fields.bodyText: Shane Bond has been banned from Test cricket after signing up to play in the Indian Cricket League. As a consequence, he won't be playing for New Zealand against England this summer. But, as he can earn more money for a few weeks of Twenty20 cricket in India than he would in a few years slogging it out on the Test circuit, Bond describes his decision as a "no-brainer".
